title: Bad Vegan: Fame. Fraud. Fugitives.
description:
Tig and Cheryl discuss "Bad Vegan: Fame. Fraud. Fugitives", the hit Netflix true crime docuseries. While Tig takes issue with the name of the doc, Cheryl spills EARLY beans on who she might be attracted to. Also, Tig checks in with Cheryl and the snerkbols about recent events in her life. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
